name: RollerBall (itch) (Elliott Bowman)
description:
A game that I brought back from the dead for Games Made Quick 1½. A simple Android game developed in Unity 5.3/.5, where the objective is to simply dodge enemies, survive and gain a new high score. You also control your ball across a procedural, low poly landscape.

Credit for things I didn't make myself:

Music - Jukedeck

Font - Origram by Nuno Dias

Player and Enemy Models - Unity Asset Store
